series: Hekima ya Kisukuma na ya lugha mbalimbali juu ya familia -- 2
title: Kugundua mbegu za injili
by_statement: waandishi, Kamati ya Utafiti, Kituo cha Utamaduni wa Usukuma.

description.value: On spreading the gospel using indigenous proverbs, sayings and riddles of the Sukuma. They are used to illustrate Biblical messages about marriage and family.

notes.value:
Includes bibliographical references (p. 109-112).

In Swahili, with some English and Sukuma.
